services_section.desktop_apps_desc: Design robust and secure enterprise software solutions to automate your processes and maximize operational efficiency.
services_section.mobile_apps_desc: Developing smooth and secure native mobile experiences (iOS & Android) to engage your users wherever they are.

services_section.maintenance_desc: Continuous technical support, and evolutionary and corrective maintenance of your existing applications.

testimonials.title: What our students say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of learners have transformed their careers with Vulsoft Academy
testimonials.t1_text: Thanks to Vulsoft Academy, I was able to acquire the skills necessary to become a web developer. Mentoring was key in my journey.
testimonials.t2_text: An incredible experience. Concrete projects allowed me to build a solid portfolio and find my first clients.
testimonials.t3_text: Digital initiation opened my eyes to the opportunities of digital. I now manage my own online store.

cookies.title: Your choice for your data
cookies.desc1: To make Vulsoft's website and mobile application available to you, we use cookies or similar technologies that allow us to collect information on your device.
cookies.desc2: Some of these technologies are necessary for our services to function correctly: you cannot refuse them. Others are optional but contribute to making your reading experience easier and in some way support Vulsoft: you can give or withdraw your consent at any time.
cookies.question: Do you agree that Vulsoft uses cookies or similar technologies useful for its operation?
